title: Colorado National Monument: Rim Rock Drive timeline
body: Rim Rock Drive Timeline       Rim Rock Drive timeline (18.6 KB pdf)              Trailblazer John Otto.                Preparing the road cushion.                Masonry work from the 1930s still exists today.                Rock work on Rim Rock Drive.                The fence crew.         The bison fence.                       The crew at Cold Shivers.         The road becomes Serpents Trail.                Trail of the Serpent.
